##My First Map - Developing Data Products Week 2 Assignment

#Let's create a map that shows Mineirão Stadium in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.

#First, install and load Leaflet package.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
```

#Create the map

```{r}
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
        addTiles()
        my_map
```

#Create a link to Mineirao Stadium, where we can get relevant information

```{r}
mineirao <- c("<a href = 'http://estadiomineirao.com.br/.html' > Mineirao</a>")
leaflet() %>% 
        addTiles() %>% 
        addMarkers(lat = -19.865833, lng = -43.970833, popup = mineirao)
```
